Verses: 1 yerupaagaalin Kumaaran Abimelekku Seegemilirukkira Than Thaayin Sagodhararidaththirkup Poi, Avargalaiyum Than Thaayin Thagappanudaiya Vamsamaana Anaivaraiyum Nokki:

2 yerupaagaalin Kumaarar Ezhubadhuperaagiya Ellaarum Ungalai Aaluvadhu Ungalukku Nalladho, Oruvan Maaththiram Ungalai Aaluvadhu Ungalukku Nalladho Endru Neengal Seegemilirukkira Sagala Periya Manusharin Kaadhugalum Ketkappesungal; Naan Ungal Elumbum Ungal Maamsamumaanavan Endru Ninaiththukkollungal Endraan.

3 appadiye Avan Thaayin Sagodharar Seegemilirukkira Sagala Periya Manusharin Kaadhugalum Ketka Indha Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Avanukkaagap Pesinaargal; Appozhudhu: Avan Nammudaiya Sagodharan Endru Avargal Sonnadhinaal, Avargal Irudhayam Abimelekkaip Pinpatra Saaindhadhu.

4 avargal Paagaal Pereeththin Kovililirundhu Ezhubadhu Vellikkaasai Eduththu Avanukkuk Koduththaargal; Avaigalaal Abimelekku Veenarum Pokkirigalumaana Manusharai Sevagaththil Vaiththaan; Avargal Avanaip Pinpatrinaargal.

5 avan Opraavilirukkira Than Thagappan Veettirkup Poi, Yerupaagaalin Kumaararaagiya Than Sagodharar Ezhubadhu Peraiyum Ore Kallin Mel Kolaiseydhaan; Aanaalum Yerupaagaalin Ilaiya Kumaaranaagiya Yodhaam Oliththirundhapadiyinaal Avan Thappinaan.
6 pinbu Seegemilirukkira Sagala Periya Manusharum, Millovin Kudumbaththaaranaivarum Koodikkondupoi, Seegemilirukkira Uyarndha Karvaalimaraththandaiyile Abimelekkai Raajaavaakkinaargal.

7 idhu Yodhaamukku Arivikkappattapodhu, Avan Poi, Keriseem Malaiyin Uchchiyil Erinindru, Uraththasaththamittuk Kooppittu, Avargalai Nokki: Seegemin Periya Manushare, Dhevan Ungalukku Sevikodukkumpadi Neengal Enakku Sevikodungal.
8 virutchangal Thangalukku Oru Raajaavai Abishegampannumpadi Poi, Olivamaraththaip Paarththu: Nee Engalukku Raajaavaayiru Endradhu.
9 adharku Olivamaram: Dhevargalum Manusharum Pugazhugira Ennilulla Enkozhumaiyai Naan Vittu, Marangalai Arasaalappoveno Endradhu.
10 appozhudhu Marangal Aththimaraththaip Paarththu: Nee Vandhu, Engalukku Raajaavaayiru Endradhu.
11 adharku Aththimaram: Naan En Madhuraththaiyum En Narkaniyaiyum Vittu, Marangalai Arasaalappoveno Endradhu.
12 appozhudhu Marangal Dhraatcha Sediyaip Paarththu: Nee Vandhu, Engalukku Raajaavaayiru Endradhu.
13 adharkuth Dhraatchachchedi: Dhevargalaiyum Manusharaiyum Magizhappannum En Rasaththai Naan Vittu Marangalai Arasaalappoveno Endradhu.
14 appozhudhu Marangalellaam Mutchediyaip Paarththu: Nee Vandhu, Engalukku Raajaavaayiru Endradhu.

15 adharku Mutchediyaanadhu Marangalaip Paarththu: Neengal Ennai Ungalukku Raajaavaaga Abishegampannugiradhu Meyyaanaal, En Nizhalile Vandhadaiyungal; Illaavittaal Mutchediyilirundhu Akkini Purappattu Leebanonin Kedhuru Marangalaip Patchikkakkadavadhu Endradhu.
16 en Thagappan Ungalukkaaga Yuththam Panni, Than Jeevanai Ennaamarpoi, Ungalai Meedhiyaaniyarin Kaiyinindru Ratchiththaar.

17 neengalo Indru En Thagappanudaiya Kudumbaththukku Virodhamaai Ezhumbi, Avarudaiya Kumaararaana Ezhubadhu Peraiyum Ore Kallinmel Kolaiseydhu, Avarudaiya Velaikkaariyin Maganaagiya Abimelekku Ungal Sagodharanaanapadiyinaal, Avanai Seegem Pattanaththaarukku Raajaavaakkineergal.
18 ippodhum Neengal Avanai Raajaavaakkina Seygai Unmaiyum Uththamamumaana Seygaiyaayirukkumaanaal,

19 neengal Yerupaakaalaiyum Avar Kudumbaththaaraiyum Nanmaiyaaga Nadaththi, Avar Kaigalin Seygaikkuththakkadhai Avarukku Seydhu, Ippadi Innaalil Avaraiyum Avar Kudumbaththaaraiyum Nadaththinadhu Unmaiyum Uththamumaayirukkumaanaal, Abimelekkinmel Neengalum Sandhoshamaayirungal; Ungalmel Avanum Sandhoshamaayirukkattum.

20 illaavittaal Abimelekkilirundhu Akkini Purappattu, Seegem Pattanaththaaraiyum, Millovin Kudumbaththaaraiyum Patchikkavum, Seegem Pattanaththaarilum Millovin Kudumbaththaarilumirundhu Akkini Purappattu, Abimelekkaip Patchikkavum Kadavadhu Endru Yodhaam Solli,
21 than Sagodharaanaagiya Abimelekkukku Bayandhu, Thappiyodi, Peyerukkup Poi, Ange Kudiyirundhaan.
22 abimelekku Isravelai Moondru Varusham Arasaandapinbu,
23 abimelekkukkum Seegemin Periya Manusharukkum Naduve Pollaappu Undaakkum Aaviyai Dhevan Varappanninaar.

24 yerupaagaalin Ezhubadhu Kumaararukku Seyyappatta Kodumai Vandhu Paliththu, Avargaludaiya Raththappazhi Avargalaik Kondra Avargaludaiya Sagodharanaagiya Abimelekkinmelum, Than Sagodhararaik Kolla Avan Kaigalaith Thidappaduththina Seegem Manushar Melum Sumarumpadiyaaga Seegemin Periya Manushar Abimelekkukku Irandagampanninaargal.

25 seegemin Manushar Malaigalin Uchchiyil Avanukkup Padhivirukkiravargalai Vaiththaargal; Avargal Thangal Aruge Vazhi Nadandhu Pogira Yaavaraiyum Kollaiyittaargal; Adhu Abimelekkukku Arivikkappattadhu.
26 ebedhin Kumaaranaagiya Kaagaal Than Sagodhararode Seegemukkul Ponaan; Seegemin Periya Manushar Avanai Nambi,
27 veliye Purappattu, Thangal Dhraatchaththottangalin Pazhangalai Aruththu, Aalaiyaatti, Aadippaadi, Thangal Dhevanin Veettirkul Poi, Pusiththukkudiththu, Abimelekkai Sabiththaargal.

28 appozhudhu Ebedhin Kumaaranaagiya Kaagaal: Abimelekku Yaar? Seegem Yaar? Naam Avanai Sevikkavendiyadhenna? Avan Yerupaagaalin Magan Allavaa? Sepool Avanudaiya Kaariyakkaaran Allavaa? Seegemin Thagappanaagiya Emorin Manusharaiye Seviyungal; Avanai Naangal Sevippaanen?
29 indha Janangal Maaththiram En Kaikkul Irukkattum; Naan Abimelekkaith Thuraththividuven Endraan. Un Senaiyaip Perugappannip Purappattuvaa Endru, Avan Abimelekkukku Solliyanuppinaan.
30 pattanaththin Adhikaariyaagiya Sepool Ebedhin Kumaaranaagiya Kaagaalin Vaarththaigalaik Kettapodhu, Kobamoondu,

31 ragasiyamaai Abimelekkinidaththukku Aatkalai Anuppi: Idho, Ebedhin Kumaaranaagiya Kaagaalum Avanudaiya Sagodhararum Seegemukku Vandhirukkiraargal; Pattanaththai Umakku Virodhamaaga Ezhuppugiraargal.
32 aagaiyaal Neer Ummodirukkum Janangalodekooda Iravil Ezhundhu Vandhu Veliyile Padhivirundhu,

33 kaalame Sooriyan Udhikkaiyil Ezhumbi, Pattanaththin Mel Vizhundhu, Avanum Avanodirukkira Janangalum Umakku Edhire Purappadumpodhu, Ummudaiya Kaikku Neridugirapadi Avanukku Seyyum Endru Solliyanuppinaan.
34 appadiye Abimelekkum, Avanodirundha Sagala Janangalum, Iravil Ezhundhupoi, Seegemukku Virodhamaaga Naalu Padaiyaagap Padhivirundhaargal.
35 ebedhin Kumaaran Kaagaal Purappattu, Pattanaththin Olimugavaasalil Nindraan; Appozhudhu Padhivirundha Abimelekku Thannodirukkira Janangalodekooda Ezhumbivandhaan.

36 kaagaal Andha Janangalaik Kandu: Idho, Malaigalin Uchchigalilirundhu Janangal Irangivarugiraargal Endru Sepoolode Sonnaan. Adharku Sepool: Nee Malaigalin Nizhalaik Kandu, Manushar Endru Ninaikkiraai Endraan.
37 kaagaalo Thirumbavum: Idho, Janangal Dhesaththin Mettilirundhu Irangivandhu, Oru Padai Meyoneneemin Karvaalimaraththin Vazhiyaai Varugiradhu Endraan.

38 adharku Sepool: Abimelekkai Naam Sevikkiradharku Avan Yaar Endru Nee Sonna Un Vaai Ippozhudhu Enge? Nee Nindhiththajanangal Avargal Allavaa? Ippozhudhu Nee Purappattu, Avargalode Yuththampannu Endraan.
39 appozhudhu Kaagaal Seegemin Manusharukku Munbaagap Purappattuppoi, Abimelekkode Yuththam Panninaan.
40 abimelekku Avanaith Thuraththa, Avan Avanukku Munbaaga Odinaan; Pattanavaasalmattum Anegar Vettundu Vizhundhaargal.
41 abimelekku Arumaavil Irundhuvittaan; Sepool Kaakaalaiyum Avan Sagodhararaiyum Seegemile Kudiyiraadhapadikkuth Thuraththivittaan.
42 marunaalile Janangal Veliyile Vayalukkup Ponaargal; Adhu Abimelekkukku Arivikkappattapodhu,

43 avan Janangalaik Koottikkondu, Avargalai Moondru Padaiyaaga Vaguththu, Veliyile Padhivirundhu, Andha Janangal Pattanaththilirundhu Purappattu Varugiradhaik Kandu, Avargalmel Ezhumbi, Avargalai Vettinaan.
44 abimelekkum Avanodirundha Padaiyum Paaindhuvandhu, Pattanaththin Olimugavaasalil Nindraargal; Matra Irandu Padaigalo Veliyilirukkira Yaavarmelum Vizhundhu, Avargalai Vettinaargal.
45 abimelekku Annaal Muzhuvadhum Pattanaththinmel Yuththampanni, Pattanaththaip Pidiththu, Adhilirundha Janangalaik Kondru, Pattanaththai Idiththu Vittu, Adhil Uppu Vidhaiththaan.
46 adhai Seegem Thurukkaththu Manushar Ellaarum Kelvippattapodhu, Avargal Peree Dhevanudaiya Kovil Aranukkul Pravesiththaargal.
47 seegem Thurukkaththu Manushar Ellaarum Ange Koodiyirukkiradhu Abimelekkukku Arivikkappattapodhu,

48 abimelekku Thannodirundha Ellaa Janangalodunkooda Salmon Malaiyil Eri, Than Kaiyile Kodariyaip Pidiththu, Oru Maraththin Kombai Vetti, Adhai Eduththu, Than Tholin Mel Pottukkondu, Thannodirundha Janangalai Nokki: Naan Enna Seygiren Endru Paarkkireergale, Neengalum Theeviramaai Ennaippola Seyyungal Endraan.

49 appadiye Sagala Janangalum Avaravar Ovvoru Kombai Vetti, Abimelekkukkup Pinsendru Avaigalai Andha Aranukku Aruge Pottu, Akkini Koluththi Andha Aranai Suttuppottaargal; Adhinaal Purusharum Sthreegalum Erakkuraiya Aayiramperaagiya Seegem Thurukkaththu Manushar Ellaarum Seththaargal.
50 pinbu Abimelekku Thebesukkuppoi, Adharku Virodhamaaip Paalayamirangi, Adhaip Pidiththaan.
51 andhap Pattanaththin Naduve Balaththadhurukkam Irundhadhu; Ange Sagala Purusharum Sthreegalum Pattanaththu Manushar Anaivarum Odip Pugundhu, Kadhavaip Poottikkondu, Thurukkaththinmel Erinaargal.
52 abimelekku Andhath Thurukkammattum Vandhu, Adhinmel Yuththampanni, Thurukkaththin Kadhavai Sutteriththup Podumpadikku, Adhin Kitta Serndhaan.
53 appozhudhu Oru Sthree Oru Endhirakkallin Thundai Abimelekkudaiya Thalaiyinmel Pottaal; Adhu Avan Mandaiyai Udaiththadhu;

54 udane Avan Than Aayudhadhaariyaagiya Velaikkaaranaik Kooppittu: Oru Sthree Ennaik Kondraal Endru Ennaik Kuriththu Sollaadhapadikku, Nee Un Pattayaththai Uruvi, Ennaik Kondru Podu Endru Avanode Sonnaan; Appadiye Avan Velaikkaaran Avanai Uruvak Kuththinaan, Avan Seththupponaan.
55 abimelekku Seththupponadhai Isravel Manushar Kandapodhu, Avargal Thangal Thangal Idangalukkup Poi Vittaargal.
56 ippadiye Abimelekku Thannudaiya Ezhubadhu Sagodhararaik Kolaiseydhadhinaal, Than Thagappanukku Seydha Pollaappai Dhevan Avanmel Thirumbumpadi Seydhaar.
57 seegem Manushar Seydha Ellaap Pollaappaiyum Dhevan Avargal Thalaiyinmel Thirumbumpadi Seydhaar; Yerupaagaalin Kumaaran Yodhaamin Saabam Avargalukkup Paliththadhu.
